body.name: Portable Washing Machine Mini Washer with Drain Basket, Foldable Small Washer Deep Cleaning for Underwear, Socks, Baby Clothes, Travel, Camping, RV, Dorm, Apartment (Purple+Blue Light)

features: 【Portable Washing Machine】Our mini portable washing machine is designed for delicate and small things. Its small load can save water and electricity.bionic hand washing, no damage to clothes, suitable for baby clothes and underwear.

【Safe and Energy Saving】Portable washer machine using TPE and food grade silicone material is a great choice for your personal items, baby items, patients families! The washing machine only needs 0.01 kWh of electricity for 1 hour, which can save you more time, money, energy and trouble. Improve your quality of life.

【Double Blue-ray Design】Coming with blue ray, the mini washer can effectively cleaning achieving an an*cleaning rate of 99%. It is really suitable for washing underwear or baby clothes. Keep healthy for you and your family.

【Foldable Design】Mini Portable Washing Machine bucket design,easy to store when not in use. Easily fits under a stool or bed without taking up too much space in your home.Mini portable washing machine is large when unfolded 11.2 x 11.2 x 9.8 inches, when unfolded and 11.2x 11.2x 4.13 inches when folded.

【Easy to Use】One button to control the washing machine, easy to use, just touch the button for two seconds to start the washing machine.It can also be used to clean fruit.The smart touch screen design allows you to freely choose the time you want, and the operation is simple and convenient for the elderly and children.
body.description: "Description: Name: Folding washing machine Material: environmentally friendly PP+TPE Rated power: 9W Washing bucket volume: 6.0L Net weight: 1.6Kg Color: Blue, Green, Pink Instructions: 1.Place the laundry in the wash tub and add an appropriate amount of detergent. 2.Add the appropriate amount of water (we recommend that the water level be 3-5 cm higher than the laundry so that the water completely covers the laundry). 3.Place the lid on the wash tub, turn on the mini washer's timer and switch it to the """"10min"""" position, and the washer will begin automatic operation. 4.When the program is finished, the timer will automatically reset and the equipment will stop. 5.Remove the laundry. 6.Disconnect the adapter from the washing machine and the power outlet. 7.Select the appropriate drainage method to drain the water in the small washing machine. Wipe out the bucket washer. Package includes: Folding washing machine * 1 Drain basket * 1 Water pipe * 1 Instructions * 1 Power supply * 1"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It is smaller than I thought but very easy to use. I can wash 3 men’s Med to Large tshirts at once or 1 sweat shirt and a Tshirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It does work.
reviews.reviewText: Works ok. Not like a regular washing machine, but it does clean well. The spin basket likes to come off it area which is a pain. It's easy to clean. The drain hose is worthless. I have to hold it to keep it on the counter during the spin cycle. It's ok for a quick was of a light shirt. Would not buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for extended travel
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical... but this thing is a little power house. It fits nicely in a checked bag for flights and definitely helps reduce the amount of clothing needed since you can wash small batches everyday.Pros:- reduces clothes needed for long trips- reduces cost of laundry while on travel- fresh clothes everyday- folds up pretty small for packingCons:- the spin basket gets off balance very easily and can only handle like one sock at a time.- drying clothes can take a while depending on where you can hang them. I have been fortunate to have the ability to hang clothes for drying overnight.- The hose is is basically uselessOverall, I've been able to wash everything in small batches except a couple pairs of heavy jeans. I will definitely be bringing this on all my extended trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite toy
reviews.reviewText: I love washing clothes with this amazing product it cleans so well and pulls dirt from clothes
